thread.title: Syrian actress Randa Mirashli dies aged 39 after a long battle with cancer
thread.title_full: Syrian actress Randa Mirashli dies aged 39 after a long battle with cancer

title: Syrian actress Randa Mirashli dies aged 39 after a long battle with cancer
text:
Syrian actress Randa Mirashli dies aged 39 after a long battle with cancer Syrian actress Randa Mirashli dies aged 39 after a long battle with cancer 2.5 5 
Published October 22nd, 2015 - 09:36   Syrian actress Randa Mirashli has passed away in Syria. (Arabi-press.com) Follow > Click here to add Facebook as an alert Click here to remove the Facebook alert Disable alert for Facebook Click here to add Hama as an alert Click here to remove the Hama alert Disable alert for Hama Click here to add Italian Hospital in Damascus as an alert Click here to remove the Italian Hospital in Damascus alert Click here to add Nawras Abboud as an alert Click here to remove the Nawras Abboud alert Disable alert for Nawras Abboud , Click here to add Randa Mirashli as an alert Click here to remove the Randa Mirashli alert Disable alert for Randa Mirashli 
Syrian actress Randa Mirashli has died on Wednesday night after a three-year battle with cancer. 
Randa passed away at the Italian Hospital in Damascus after going into a coma due to her incurable condition. 
The funeral took place on Thursday morning, where the 39-year-old late actress was buried in Hama, Syria, reported Ammon News. 
News about Randa's death first broke after her husband Nawras Abboud announced it in a heartbreaking status on Facebook. 
"There are no more words to say. The air is heavy. Trees' colors have changed. The sky is the color of sadness. There's no point in anything anymore. Goodbye Randa Mirashli. Goodbye my love, my life." 
Randa has left three devastated children behind, to whom we send our deepest condolences. Advertisement Â© 2000 - 2015 Al Bawaba (www.albawaba.com) Rate Article:
